column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Lead by Communicating
#Text=Lead by communicating effectively with people .

#Text=Everyone should , but leaders of organizations/teams and managers/coaches of areas , departments and such definitely need to get out of the den/office and into the work or sport places , etc. You never know what ideas might emerge when two people in different parts of the organization are talking about improving things that they ’re doing .
#Text=Great things can be birthed ...
#Text=Steps
#Text=Do n’t waste time roaming the sidelines : Avoid sliding into the background .

#Text=Get into your field of endeavor at school , plant or the office — not spying , looking/watching from a distance — losing opportunities because you are off the front lines of work , play or school .
#Text=While your team , technicians , producers , sales force are in action , be out there communicating .
#Text=Be an " enthusiast/cheerleader " if that might work .
#Text=Continually engage the entire collection of teams — at each level , bottom to top .
#Text=Talk with production and sales people ; not just their managers .
#Text=Pump customer service for their input on business through the customers ' eyes .
#Text=Prime the office-mates , warehouse-men , and others — individually and in groups , communicating together .
#Text=Tune in to ideas and build on them .
#Text=Relational management builds relationships : synergistic energies/connections with minds and emotions of the employees .
#Text=It primes the feeling of loyalty to the business and a vestment in the desire to improve the processes and mechanisms .
#Text=Individuals tend to be more accountable to the management with whom they have relationships beyond just their daily work duties , particularly when the individuals are fully-valued .
#Text=Ask helpful , reasonable questions and openly receive the friendly answers .
#Text=Listen to what your coworkers are seeing in their part of the work , school or game .
#Text=Listen to what they are thinking and analyze thoughts with a high level of empathy .
#Text=Learn what is happening out there in the trenches !
#Text=What was or is each of the other team or company marketers doing that you could latch on to and extend as well ?
#Text=What trends , strengths and weaknesses does each man see in the competition ?
#Text=Try " walking the floor " , discussing in classrooms or patrolling the practice field where you can learn from the employees on the line what really is going on and how to improve things .
#Text=Get outside your comfort zone
#Text=Circulate , meet new faces and idea sets . —
#Text=Find out what everyone is thinking and dreaming .
#Text=Do this all the time even if associates are uncomfortable going around the room and meeting others .
#Text=This is fun , engaging , and expanding to the soul and to the mind .
#Text=You will likely find that you improve understandings , enthusiasm and social flexibility and also develop facility in targeting critical insights , then capitalizing upon them .
#Text=Work together , to hone your short-/medium-/long-term goals and put legs under your plans , hands-on .
#Text=Encourage teammates to give you the input and feedback that 's needed to make the right calls , decisions .
#Text=Cash in the value of insight gained by talking to formalize and expand plans — big and small — that you can press into execution successfully .
#Text=Prime the idea flow by constantly talking with different people , by listening to what they say and then by working together to crystallize their view of a super path forward .
#Text=It is n’t your place to draw up the " vision " of ( and for ) your enterprise all on your own .
#Text=The team wins when everyone is talking to and engaging with a variety of team members .
#Text=Honor the knowledge that each great idea starts with a conversation between two people and grow using the natural feed of energy by that continuing relationship .
#Text=Talk business with people in your team or office , by talking with all of them in groups and many individually , some every day .
#Text=Know what they ’re doing to improve , what they ’re thinking about the business , what their ideas are .
#Text=Personalize your efforts
#Text=Trust your people .
#Text=" Friends " give you the feedback and insight that will help you grow the business .
#Text=Show that you trust their expertise in their jobs , in all the different aspects that come together to make your organization succeed .
#Text=Your team ca n’t excel without everyone believing , contributing and sharing their ideas and thoughts .
#Text=Encourage people to be talking to each other about good ideas for improving various phases of practices , production , the organization -- and to bring it to your attention .
#Text=Show that you are grateful for suggestions , perhaps cash awards , plaques , etc.
#Text=Give credit for changes to the contributors .
#Text=Avoid characterizing their new ideas , suspend judgment .
#Text=Putting ideas together is where creative thinking ( synthesizing ) and innovation comes from .
#Text=Do n't spend much time standing around with comfortable acquaintances , people you already know at trade shows and conventions , dinners , banquets , etc.
#Text=Get out and engage in fresh ideas by opening yourself to alternative views .
#Text=Let the breeze of change cleanse the stasis of your enterprise . —
#Text=Bring to your core the realization that the life and vitality of your company walks hand-in-hand with its ability to :
#Text=Grasp , envision , and integrate many facets of meaningful change — from local to global — using such things as i-shops or i-malls .
#Text=Vitalize electronic communications
#Text=Adapt vibrant communication technologies : phones , email , voice-mail , conference calls , Skype/visual conversations , videos , ...
#Text=all the above , it works for you .
#Text=Create advantages , using social networking .
#Text=Realize that in order to be able to contribute to communicating in very effective ways , it often takes person-to-person/eye-to-eye contact/real arms-length conversations :
#Text=Motivated people fulfilling needs are the building blocks of innovation .
#Text=If you do n't do a lot of advertising , you can build gratitude and loyalty by doing your best to show concern .

#Text=Then , ask customers to tell others about your promptness , fine capabilities , great results , desired services , etc. Fulfill needs and solve problems right where you are using electronic devices to communicate to the fullest .
#Text=Tips

#Text=Always take the time to talk to the people with whom you do business , actually talking with people and remembering them , make notes — not just chatting about business or the weather , but about life/family , etc.
#Text=Quality management ( QM ) works well when it uses lower level process information derived from conversation to communicate and formalize how best to improve the organization .
#Text=( Make sure to draw from group conversations as well as individual conversations . )
